channel.title: What to do
channel.description:
<Telenim> Tabbykiller, speed hack on the track <Telenim> lol <Tabbykiller> lol ok <Telenim> there are signs pointing to agls <Tabbykiller> did he kill u? <Telenim> no <Tabbykiller> ok coming now <Telenim> bats portal is out <Telenim> needs to be re lit <Tabbykiller> lolol he place is effd <_^_> Tabbykiller <_^_> whoare you <Tabbykiller> nim, did u do that to their house? <Telenim> yeah Tabbykiller <Telenim> burn it down etc
Unfortunantly I have no power where they said this; obviously Telenim needs to be banned (that was never a question) if we find his accounts, but what about TabbyKiller (SteamTempest) ? I can't tell if it's incriminating or not.

item.title: What to do
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

We used to have logs for it, but MITB stopped uploading them

Read full topic

item.title: What to do
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Ohh true that. Is there any logs you can check for his last login time? If you find out that he has been using the account actively on the server then i’d personally extend his ban time by a period of time.

Read full topic

item.title: What to do
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Logging into the forum isn’t the same as using it to evade on the server though, he could still have used it there

Read full topic

item.title: What to do
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Considering he hasn’t even logged into the account since he made it, it shouldn’t be of too much concern in my opinion. Unless of course it was made to cause trouble and harass us.

Read full topic

item.title: What to do
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Update with the unban topic -

http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=535016

Looks like he made this account to evade 2 days after he was banned. Thoughts about whether this evasion should affect the ban? (It does IP match)

Read full topic

item.title: What to do
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I’m sick of that whole group, I’d probably just leave them all banned, but that may be harsh, meh.

Read full topic

item.title: What to do
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:8, topic:398866”]So Tabbykiller is contacting me now, is this a perm ban or what can I tell him?[/quote]Well hes been banned for a week. Not really sure how long he should be banned anyhow tho =/

Read full topic

item.description:

item.description:

item.title: What to do
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

What channel was this said on? I’m pretty sure I don’t have my powers anymore on #moparscape so I wouldn’t be of much help to you there. We can still warn him though I suppose…

Read full topic

item.title: What to do
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I don’t doubt at all that they are hacking together, especially after the report against jrubrkletern where he was reported for xray. I think a ban personally. Any other staff input?

Read full topic

item.title: What to do
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

It definitely warrants a warning at least. Anyone who hangs around with Telenim is obviously going to get in trouble as all he does is grief the server.

Read full topic
